评论详情: This is a great jacket!  I am 5'6, 148lbs, 36D and ordered a medium.  I also ordered it in Green.  I love everything about it, other than the is too big for my liking.  I prefer things to be more fitted and this is too big and boxy on me.  I'm really hoping the small works because it is really cute and different.  I'm also going to get it in another color as the green shade didn't look great against my skin tone, but it is a really nice green. I can't wait to get it in a small!
Good quality and fits as expected. I’ve received complements each time I’ve worn it. A good substitute and much more stylish than my old lady sweaters.
I love the jacket and it fits properly. The “denim” portion was extremely thin/lightweight, making the “jacket” more like a shirt.
Really like the color! The corduroy is also nice. Good quality and great value for the money.

The jacket is comfortable, and the fabric is soft and flexible. It is an oversized style, but the oversizing extends the sleeves over the hands and the arms are excessive making the jacket look frumpy. Oversized has its fashion desire, but even ordering a medium the sleeve length is only a half an inch smaller. I suggest checking the sizing before you order, I wanted to order again, but a medium will still be too large. I might contemplate a small because Jacket is so nice.

评论概述: Thin and sizing is just off
评论详情: It seems like everytime I order from China, their sizing is just way off. I don't know what it is. I use their US size and it's just off. If I order larger, it's just too big but the right size is just off and doesn't fit right. I'm convinced it's something more than sizing like the cut is off or something. Anyway, this shirt was cute but super thin and just didn't fit right. It was huge on me, not oversized and cute but baggy and large.

I am 5’7”, 145 lbs which is important when writing a review.  I bought this jacket in a Large and fit is perfect.  I have room to wear a long sleeve turtleneck under it on a cool day.  It is super cute with my black jeans.  I would recommend.

评论概述: Great fit, wish it had pockets
评论详情: Love the jacket, nice fit, no pockets though.

Great top! I am 5'4" 145 pounds and a size medium fits good as an oversized chunky shirt. The back is long enough to cover my rear end and the sleeves are long which I long.  It's thick and warm, making it great for lounging around the house or on a nice fall day.
I love this jacket.  Looks great and is very comfy  Great value for what I paid.

I bought this as a gift for a 24 year old and she loves it. Lots of Oohs and Ahhs when it was opened. The colors match the picture. It’s well made and the fit was expected. I bought a Medium and it was true to size.
I've received so many compliments on this jacket. The contrast between the denim and the plaid is very eye catching. If I could change one thing, I would add pockets.

Looks cute, exactly like the photos, but definitely runs big. I ordered an XL,could've gone with a L, maybe even a M. But if you want to wear it over something kind of bulky, it'll be fine. Also, the plaid is just sweater material with nothing underneath. So, not sure how it will wash/dry. If it shrinks, I may amend to 3 stars.

I really like the style- wish there were side pockets and that it was just a bit heavier but overall it's nicely made.  Arm length is a little long but better than too short. I like loose fit clothing, it's a bit snug at the waiste when buttoned.
Looks good & fits great. Many compliments.
Looks like the picture. Well made

I have this in pink & black also, so cute, love the style, the pattern and the color and the fit has bn perfect for layering or just a tank or shirt underneath. I will work my way up to saving so I can order more colors!
Bought for my daughters for Christmas. They both loved them!
Beautiful shirt jacket. Colors are great. Bought pink and purple. Recipients loved them. Vibrant colors. Good buy.
Love this jacket…. It fit perfect, super cute, comfortable..
Love this jacket.  Goes with everything.
Love the color and style. Arrived earlier than expected.
fits nice
I ordered an XL thinking it would be more comfortable, but it just looks like I'm wearing my boyfriends jacket.  I wish I had exchanged it for a large, but I didn't want to wait another 2 weeks.
Runs big and feels more like a shirt than a jacket. Wish it had pockets as well.
Comes in many colors, patterns n sizes, great for everyday wear
I love the coziness of wearing this. For the money it was great find and the colors are soft and pretty.
It's comfortable and fits great.
Runs big. Fun jacket. Got lots of compliments. But yes, no pockets.

评论概述: Runs a little larger/ bleached pocket
评论详情: I thought about returning  it because of the bleaching but I embellished it to hide this stain . Nice weight. I bought it for a trip so I will keep it.
My new favorite jacket. Love the fit

I love this shacket.  It's a good fit, well made, comfortable.  I love the color.  I bought one in light grey and another in light red which is more like a burgundy wine type red, not a xmas red.  Both are perfect for Fall and I will get so much use of them.
It’s cute, the material is nice, but no pockets like you’d expect for a jacket
not as thick as I thought it would be but I love it!
It’s suggested an extra large I figured being a jacket an extra large would work to wear it over a T-shirt. It is still too big. So I would say this is true to size or large.
I love this jacket.  It is warm and comfortable.  Size is correct.  Received lots of compliments.
I loved this. It made our fall pictures pop. It's true to size and super cute.
The jacket it’s really well and it looks really nice. It’s a great in between jacket and colder days. I pair it with a vest.
The material was a little disappointing. A bit too thin.
It fits a bit odd and just looks and feels cheaply made. It looks terrible when wearing it. I don’t recommend.

I think the material is thinner than I thought, not as thick as my denim jacket, but its comfortable and looks as good as the picture shown.  I bought a larger size so I can wear a thicker shirt or sweat shirt under it, and it will be perfect for many occasions.
THIS IS SO BEAUTIFUL
NO POCKETS!  Soft. Nice color. Easy to throw on. Maybe more expensive than necessary but it’ll do. I still think pockets would make it perfect.
I want every color! Well worth buying. I’m 160 and medium fits great
Love this jacket/shirt. Fits a little oversized great with jeans or leggings. Quality is good and washes great. I did hang it to dry.
It’s actually cute!  I usually wear large but i ordered a medium and it’s perfect.  I’ll probably wear a tank top or t shirt under so i’ll still have plenty of room.  5’3 155
Looks great. Soft and warm.

Runs true to size.  Nicely made. Dungarees and flannel. A little longer than Jacket, more shirt jacket with a pocket on each breast closes with chrome buttons as does the shirt. Very stylish, can use on cool days or layers.
I love mine and receive lots of compliments!
Love the weight and design of both the denim and plaid material. Versatile as far as what to wear underneath for many occasions.
The jacket runs very small. For it to look like the image order two sizes up. Material is quite thin
Jacket fits perfectly and love the material. Wish it had pockets for hands but still love it!
Sporting a size medium- 5’7 125lbs- love it!
Did not like the material.  Will probably return.
Cute jacket, better quality than I expected, Havnt washed yet,  I ordered the black..the only thing was the plaid seemed a little different from picture but not a deal breaker

I love jackets to wear inside like jean , or cotton, i dress in layers cant wear long sleeve sweaters i get too hot. This is on sale now i paid 45.00 for it. I am 5'4" and 200 lbs i ordered 2x fits perfect accept for around wrists a bit big so i cuffed up a bit. love the feel and look but it doesnt have pockets lower where you would expect it to have a pocket just on chest. So its a shacket but nice.

Super cute jacket for fall! I ordered the green and the yellow. The yellow is not like the color advertised so I returned it. But I love the green color! The material is %100 cotton and very comfortable. It would look cute with leggings or jeans! Only negative is it doesn’t have pockets. It is also long enough in the back to cover my bum if I wear it with leggings.

评论用户: Nice just to small for me
评论详情: It runs small

I was expecting a denim material, but this was a weird fabric. The weight is very thin and it’s not warm at all. It looked like a dollar store purchase. I was so disappointed when I opened it. Needless to say, it went right back.
I love this jacket. The material is great and the color is beautiful.
Like the jacket, but much thinner than expected. Not a thick denim. It is brown, lighting makes it look purple. Comfortable.
This is so good.  The quality is beyond good and it is very in style for fall and winter.  I purchased in two colors.  I would buy again
The size is perfect, and my wife loves the coat. At first, I thought the lighter material on the exterior was a little weird, but it really does work nicely.  Highly recommended

Love this jacket and think it’s so cute. But when I was looking for a fall jacket I was expecting this to be a little thicker denim or at least flannel on the inside. This is basically an oversized shirt with flannel sewed in…. It’s totally layerable and I swing between Lg and XL for fit and a large was fine an XL would’ve been too big. I’m keeping it, because it’s really cute, but I think my search for a fall jacket continues.
I got this a few days ago and absolutely love it,size is perfect,wore it and got many compliments, I have ordered another one in pink

评论概述: Cute but Care Instructions are a pain
评论详情: I love this, it's warm. However, is says machine washable, but lay flat to dry. If you are limited in time or space to do so, and if you hate the feel of clothes that are not tumble dried, as well as looking potentially creased from laying flat then it's not worth it.
Love this jacket!!

Very happy with this purchase, the style is to be oversized, so the arms are bigger and the back has a lot of space/room as well. I wear it open not buttoned sense it looks a little bulky buttoned up. The arm length is great. I would most deffinetly size Down. I am usually a medium so I ordered a small. I almost consider sizing down 2 for a tighter fit/look if that’s what u like. It’s very cute and keeps u very warm. I’ve gotten compliments on this every time I’ve worn. Wish it had pockets on the lower part but the top pockets are good too. Ill be purchasing again in other colors.
I have washed the product 3 times and there is still a strong odor of the product. Shameful because everything else is superb of the product.
Very cute and oversized. I honestly wish I would have gotten a medium instead of a large for a more fitting look, but the oversized look is cute too. I might order another one in a medium
Ordered the khaki jacket and didn't look like the picture when it arrived. Not comfortable. We will be sending it back.

I ordered a large based on the size chart but it is too big. I weigh 160 and 44 inch chest. A medium works best for me. Other than that it is good quality. Heavy material and pretty color. I ordered the green.
It looks much better in the picture.  It’s shorter in length. The quality is poor.
Quality is great.  Very cute. The only thing missing is pockets.. I NEED pockets, but I still love it.
Just buy it! Love the oversized fit, goes with so many tops. Washes up well, just have to iron the bottom seams down. I get so many compliments on this jacket.
I like this shocker. I only wish it had pockets.
Lighter than expected. Very cute and comfortable.
Nicelook with a youthful twist. Wears well with contrasting shirt or blouse.
This jacket is comfortable just a little bulky around the mid section.  A feminine cut would be a lot more flattering.  The material is nice and feels well made.
This is such a cute top, I love the fabric and the texture of it and the colors are so cute but it fits really large, I ordered my typical size and it’s very large on me

I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this jacket after reading a few reviews that said fabric was thin.  I didn't find that to be the case.  It's typical denim and a nice tweed.  Looks just like the photo.I would however say size down one size unless you like your jackets really oversized .  Large was recommended for me, but after reading the size chart I went medium.  It's just fine with plenty  of room to spare.
The arms are white wide and the coat is not lined. Which makes it itchy to my skin. Plus the weight of the jacket was deceiving. I will return it.
I love how this looks. It fits pretty decent everywhere, but is a little snug under the armpit area. Debating exchanging it for a larger size or dealing with it.
The item description states that it's oversized. I ordered the recommended size, and the item is too small. Besides that, the item and it's pattern is cute.
It’s extremely cute. I’m 5’9 and 158lbs and the medium fits well with room to layer. The smell was strong. I immediately washed it.
I love this! It is exactly as it was described and pictured in the ad!!!!!
Super cute I have ordered more as always I size up one size

评论概述: Well fitting, comfortable and very cute!
评论详情: I am 5'4 and about 155lbs and I ordered the medium.  Normally I have to order up a size for shirts and jackets because I'm hyper-flexible and need extra room around the shoulders and arm length.  This jacket fits me perfectly with plenty of room without being oversized.  The material is lightweight but much more substantial than a shirt and works well for spring and fall temps.  Very nice quality and I will definitely buy more items from this brand!

评论概述: Cute Jacket, don't go a size bigger though.
评论详情: I only wish I had taken their suggestion and ordered the large  instead of the XLarge. I thought that I would like a little extra room for layering underneath.  But I think it looks a little big on me. Totally my fault for not taking their suggested sizing.  Love the color and style though.
Color slightly diff than ordered. Fit is too large. Kept it to use as a layering piece when it get colder out. (Maybe.)
It certainly was not oversized. I did not like the feel as the plaid was not an overlay on the denin but stitched to it and it did not hang well. Returning mine.
Nice length. Good fall jacket.
Wear to many activities
Material is almost see through
Great jacket for early spring and fall, color is as shown in the pictures.
Love it but runs big.

评论概述: Very nice jacket.  It's my second one and recieve many compliments on it.
评论详情: This is my second jacket.  I'm very pleased with the quality.
This jacket is true to color and size. It is comfortable and appears to be well made. As yet, I can't comment on durability or how well it holds up after laundering.
I haven't seen it, was sent directly as gift. She loves it, Better than she expected. It's a tad big but she is a tad tiny. So it may run true to size. Bought the smallest size.
The jacket has no tags on the outside or inside to even show the size, that worries me . wondering why its like that, just hope it fits when i give it to my granddaughter for her birthday this week
